_source.text: After age 50, a person has a better than one in three chance of developing this group of medical conditions characterized by insulin resistance and the presence of obesity, abdominal fat, high blood sugar and triglycerides, low HDL (good) blood cholesterol, and high blood pressure.

text: After age 50, a person has a **better** **than** one in three chance of developing this group of medical
conditions characterized by insulin resistance and the presence of **obesity**, abdominal fat, high **blood**
**sugar** and triglycerides, low HDL (good) blood cholesterol, and high blood pressure.
